metadata.summary: Interact with Tailscale software-defined networking using native CLI through LimaCharlie's Cloud CLI Extension
metadata.primary_use_case: Monitor and manage Tailscale network status and configuration from LimaCharlie using response actions

Execute Cloud CLI extension with Tailscale CLI commands
